title.narrative: CF-Support to Vulnerable Groups Community Development Project

description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to rehabilitate social infrastructure and improve the capacity of local stakeholders to plan and manage local recovery in targeted areas of CAR.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V (5.02) (a) | Description :The Service Agreement has been duly authorized by the Recipient andAGETIP-CAF and is legally binding. | Due Date :30-Oct-2009
Finance Agreement :Section I (A) (2) (a) | Description :The Recipient shall have established the Inter-ministerial SteeringCommittee for the overall Project guidance | Due Date :31-Aug-2009

Finance Agreement :Section I (A) (5) (a) | Description :The Recipient shall have established and shall thereafter maintain fourregional Project coordination teams (each a #Regional Project Coordination Team#) | Due Date :30-Nov-2009
Finance Agreement :Section I (B) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with theprovisions of the Anti-Corruption Guidelines | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Section I (E) (d) | Description :In the event of any inconsistency between the provisions of the ProjectImplementation Manual and this Agreement, the provisions ofthis Agreement shall prevail. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Section II (B) (4) | Description :The Recipient shall have caused a computerized accounting system satisfactoryto the Association to have been installed and shall be up and running. | Due Date :30-Nov-2009

Finance Agreement :Section II (B) (5) | Description :The Recipient shall have recruited an external independent auditor selected inaccordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 to the Agreement. | Due Date :30-Nov-2009

Finance Agreement :Section III (E) | Description :The Recipient shall have expanded its simplified Procurement Plan and adopted adetailed Procurement Plan for the Project, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Aug-2009

Finance Agreement :Section IV (B) (b) (i) | Description :No withdrawal shall be made under Categories 3 and 4 above until the ESMF,RPF, and IDPP have been adopted and disclosed. | Due Date :30-Nov-2009
Finance Agreement :Section V (A) | Description :The Recipient and the Association shall carry out a mid-term review of the Project| Due Date :01-Jul-2012
